name: Box Bouncers
description:
(Disclaimer!

Bugs that I cannot fix what so ever.

Use unity WebGL Fullscreen.

No ending scene.

Credits are :

https://bensound.com (For music)

)

In Box Bouncers you will click on two boxes and create a connection between them and use this to allow a marble to get to the end.

Press enter to start after clicking on two boxes.

You can pair multiple boxes.

There is also another mechanic that you'll have to find out.

Good Luck!
